name: Fix the Beat
description:
Fix the Beat - WGJ#104
Work as a repair facility robot tasked to fix broken arrow plates. Press corresponding arrow key when plate is in front of the robot to fix it.

Spoilers: You cant fix the beat

Controls 
- Fix arrows:  Arrow Keys

Submission to  the Weekly Game Jam  #104 (theme: Fix It)

Credits 
Programming: Mekyi 
Graphics: Novacchi
Music & Sounds: Novacchi
